commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas989b425"

-fails-if(MOZ_WIDGET_TOOLKIT!="windows") == 391045.html 391045-ref.html # windows-specific bug
